backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing role‑based access control and full repair ticket CRUD with status updates, history tracking, and user/admin query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for authentication behavior improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files, used as reference for build or documentation automation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining custom charcoal/amber OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx with HEIFIX branding.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout and routing setup including header navigation, mobile menu, role-aware links, and page mounting.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout UI component using Internet Identity, showing errors with retry action and clearing cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard that blocks unauthenticated users and displays login errors plus troubleshooting tips.
frontend/src/components/StatusHistoryTim: Visual timeline rendering ticket status history with timestamps, badges, and optional notes.
frontend/src/components/TicketStatusBadg: Badge component mapping ticket status values to readable labels and UI variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useRole.ts: Defines hooks to fetch the caller's role and admin status from the backend using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTickets.ts: Implements ticket-related hooks for creating tickets, fetching user/all tickets, getting ticket details, and updating ticket status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom light/dark theme using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTicketPage.tsx: UI page for submitting a repair ticket, validating input, and showing the created ticket confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/MyTicketsPage.tsx: Displays the user's tickets with sorting, loading states, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboardPage.ts: Admin-only dashboard displaying and filtering all tickets, with UI to edit ticket status, notes, and price estimates.
frontend/src/pages/TicketDetailsPage.tsx: Shows full ticket details, status history, and metadata with loading/error handling and navigation back to the user's tickets list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, breakpoints, animations, and plugins for consistent UI styling.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, issues, and requirements for the HEIFIX app’s current development state.
